description: You possess 50 resource units to allocate for sustaining an island community. You may distribute some/all units to a neighboring island known for better resource management which may triple the sustainability impact (e.g., 1 unit → 3 units of impact). The neighboring leader will decide how much benefit they will share back with you.

behavior_choices.trust_none: Distribute 0 units to the neighboring island.
behavior_choices.trust_low: Distribute 15 units to the neighboring island.
behavior_choices.trust_high: Distribute all 50 units to the neighboring island.
